instruction: Suggest the best issue tracking system for a software development team of 10 members.
output: Jira is a great issue tracking system for software development teams of up to 10 members. Jira provides features such as project management, agile development tools, and real-time progress tracking. It also has an easy-to-use user interface and integrates seamlessly with other tools and applications. Additionally, it is highly scalable, allowing teams to manage up to one thousand members.
